オプション1: The red object turned out to be a skeleton.

(It’s probably one of the islanders...
I’d like to examine the body, but...)

Even though it was just bones, touching a human corpse was terrifying.
(Coming all this way was hard... but I have to do it now.)
Star Man steeled himself and examined the remains.

The person’s belongings included two maps.
One appeared to be a map of this island.
It didn’t show the current location, but based on his travels so far, he could roughly guess it.
He also found a map showing the Ladeon Federation, the Zeefolk Republic, and this island.

(Looks like this island is called Prolitan Island. I’ll show everyone later.
The nearest country, the Zeefolk Republic, is about 100 km away.
No way I can swim that far...)
[Map information in the menu has been updated.]
